title: Ping Spikes
body: Recently when I play league of legends my ping goes absolutely nuts. When I join a game my ping starts out at 80 for the first minute or thirty seconds then it all goes down the drain and it goes over 200 for the entire match. Also whenever I die it always falls to 60 or so, then I go back to lane and again it goes over 200. I have it on the lowest settings, no other apps opened and wifi speed is around 45 to 50 mbps. Also at night my ping goes beyond terrible sometimes reaching over 9k but usually stays within 1k to 3k which is still bad. My champ moves so slow I can't even see them cast an ability or an AA, and when I get ganked the jungler suddenly pops on my screen and I'm dead. I get reported over and over because of this, please any help will be appreciated.

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes and input delays can be due to network issues maintaining a strong connection either from running on wifi, settings, or something else.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out for sure!  My recommendation would be to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to supplement the results of your log reader, and resolve whatever is causing the hiccup in your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I found out that my router has QoS but I do not know how or where to change the settings to make LoL a priority.
